item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Don't Publish with IEEE (148 points | 35 comments)
2. MQTT turns 25 (and has taken over the world) (32 points | 1 comment)
3. RISC-V Announces Ratification of the RVA23 Profile (43 points | 7 comments)
4. Math is still catching up to the genius of Ramanujan (475 points | 244 comments)
5. First images from Euclid are in (678 points | 198 comments)
6. Performance of popular microcontroller boards running uLisp (30 points | 3 comments)
7. LTESniffer: An Open-Source LTE Downlink/Uplink Eavesdropper (183 points | 21 comments)
8. Understanding Gaussians (27 points | 1 comment)
9. Just want simple TLS for your .internal network? (66 points | 30 comments)
10. The Multics Maclisp Compiler: The Basic Hackery – A Tutorial (1977) (33 points | 1 comment)
11. Writing a Mathematica Interpreter in Typescript (52 points | 4 comments)
12. An amateur historian has discovered a long-lost short story by Bram Stoker (273 points | 98 comments)
13. Guide to Fine-Tuning LLMs (130 points | 14 comments)
14. Cosine (YC W23) Hiring JavaScript/TS Dev to Build AI SWE ( | hide)
15. A Controversial Rare-Book Dealer Tries to Rewrite His Own Ending (47 points | 11 comments)
16. Learning to Learn (119 points | 57 comments)
17. Civet: A Superset of TypeScript (159 points | 131 comments)
18. Show HN: Data Formulator – AI-powered data visualization from Microsoft Research (129 points | 13 comments)
19. A Lisp compiler to ARM written in Lisp (10 points | discuss)
20. Advice for first-time inventors from a patent engineer (18 points | 10 comments)
21. How should the new element work? (46 points | 25 comments)
22. Building a Game with the Real Engine (70 points | 20 comments)
23. Scalene: A high-performance, high-precision CPU, GPU, memory profiler for Python (127 points | 12 comments)
24. Paranormasight: A Game Exploring the Depths of Honjo in Tokyo (44 points | 7 comments)
25. When machines could see you (3 points | discuss)
26. Firefox-Passwords-Decryptor: Extracts and decrypts passwords saved in Firefox (90 points | 68 comments)
27. New discovery reveals how diatoms capture CO2 so effectively (77 points | 17 comments)
28. Mind Wandering: More than a Bad Habit (2018) [pdf] (94 points | 36 comments)
29. Overengineering a way to know if people are in my university's CS lab (153 points | 70 comments)
30. Brazil Arrests 'USDoD' Hacker in FBI Infragard Breach (24 points | 4 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
